    B

    Bishop - Class in engine.forPiece
    The Bishop class represents a bishop chess piece that moves diagonally across the board.
    Bishop(Alliance, int, boolean, int) - Constructor for class engine.forPiece.Bishop
    Constructs a new Bishop with full specification of all attributes.
    Bishop(Alliance, int, int) - Constructor for class engine.forPiece.Bishop
    Constructs a new Bishop with the specified alliance, position, and move count.
    BISHOP - Enum constant in enum class engine.forPiece.Piece.PieceType
    Represents a bishop with a value of 3.3 pawns.
    bishopBonus(int, Board) - Method in enum class engine.Alliance
    Calculates the bonus for a bishop at a given position on the board.
    bishopEndgameEvaluation(Player, Board) - Method in class engine.forPlayer.forAI.EndgameBoardEvaluator
    Evaluates bishop endgame patterns, including color complexes, mobility, and bishop vs knight dynamics.
    BLACK - Enum constant in enum class engine.Alliance
    An enumeration representing black in a game of chess.
    BLACK_BISHOP_PREFERRED_COORDINATES - Static variable in enum class engine.Alliance
    Represents the preferred coordinates for black bishops on the chessboard.
    BLACK_KNIGHT_PREFERRED_COORDINATES - Static variable in enum class engine.Alliance
    Represents the preferred coordinates for black knights on the chessboard.
    BLACK_PAWN_PREFERRED_COORDINATES - Static variable in enum class engine.Alliance
    Represents the preferred coordinates for black pawns on the chessboard.
    BLACK_ROOK_PREFERRED_COORDINATES - Static variable in enum class engine.Alliance
    Represents the preferred coordinates for black rooks on the chessboard.
    blackMove - Variable in class engine.forGUI.GameHistoryPanel.Row
    The move text for the black player.
    blackPieces - Variable in class engine.forBoard.Board
    A collection of black pieces currently present on the board.
    blackPlayer - Variable in class engine.forBoard.Board
    The player controlling the black pieces on the board.
    blackPlayer() - Method in class engine.forBoard.Board
    Retrieves the black player controlling the black pieces.
    BlackPlayer - Class in engine.forPlayer
    The `BlackPlayer` class extends `Player` to represent a player controlling the black pieces in a chess game.
    BlackPlayer(Board, Collection<Move>, Collection<Move>) - Constructor for class engine.forPlayer.BlackPlayer
    Constructs a new `BlackPlayer` object with the specified board and collections of legal moves for both white and black players.
    blackPlayerType - Variable in class engine.forGUI.GameSetup
    The PlayerType representing the current black player.
    board - Variable in class engine.forBoard.Move
    The current state of the chess board.
    board - Variable in class engine.forPlayer.Player
    The chessboard associated with this player.
    Board - Class in engine.forBoard
    The Board class represents a chess board containing 64 tiles and chess pieces.
    Board(Board.Builder) - Constructor for class engine.forBoard.Board
    Constructs a board from a builder object containing the board configuration.
    BOARD_PANEL_DIMENSION - Static variable in class engine.forGUI.Table

    Board.Builder - Class in engine.forBoard
    A builder class for constructing instances of the Board class with specific configurations.
    boardConfig - Variable in class engine.forBoard.Board
    A map representing the configuration of pieces on the board.
    BoardConfigurations - Variable in class engine.forBoard.Board.Builder

    boardDirection - Variable in class engine.forGUI.Table
